name: Stutter Bomb™
details:
Momentary Line Mute or Kill SwitchConnect this little box anywhere in your signal chain to emulate Randy Rhoads & Buckethead-type stutters without modding your guitars.
Also use as a momentary line mute or a kill switch. 
Press and hold the switch down and switch guitars silently etc...
Does not require power to operate
http://www.loop-master.com/stutter-bomb153-p-52.html
